name: Hook Dash
description: The game is a 2d game that flows from left to right. The character encounters obstacles of different types and characteristics on this path. Apart from that, you have to be careful while overcoming these obstacles with the character, there are thorns at the bottom and top. The logic of the game is simple. Use your hook to maneuver the player to the right. There are different obstacles in the game. Obstacles are in sets and spawn randomly in sets. There are 5 sets (14 hurdles in total) for now. This will evolve over time.
